DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old Referred diagnostically CaCT , CT scan and/or CAG examination due suspicion coronary artery disease Subjects condition must stable subject must refer due suspicion acute coronary syndrome Subject willing adhere study procedure Has sign inform consent form authorization registration publication health information Has acute coronary syndrome stroke Arterial fibrillation Known severe arrhythmia rest heart rate 85 bpm Known diastolic murmur due heart valve disease Has previous bypass operation , open chest surgery , donor heart mechanical heart Reduced ejection fraction < 50 % Inability understand adhere instruction acoustic Dataacquisition ( i.e . subject able hold breath due KOL asthma ) Inability perform CTangio and/or subsequent CAG In active treatment cancer In active treatment immunosuppression transplantation Established pursue pregnancy breast feeding Has damage skin spot patch place recording .
